name: The Last Keeper
description:
Description 📖 

You are the Last Keeper of the Ruined Island. Delay the inavitable collapse and leave the island before it’s too late. Or fight bravely against the Destruction and die like a real hero.

How to play 🎮

Use WASD to walk

 1 2 3 4 to choose building and LMB to place it

Game for Ludum Dare 50: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/the-last-keeper
